required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Concurrent Oxytocin With Membrane Sweeping Versus Dinoprostone Pessary in Labor Induction of Nulliparas at Term
clinical_study.official_title: Concurrent Oxytocin With Membrane Sweeping Versus Dinoprostone Pessary in Labor Induction of Nulliparas at Term

brief_summary.textblock: To compare concurrent oxytocin with membrane sweeping versus dinoprostone pessary in labor induction for nulliparas at term with an unfavorable cervix

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of initiating intervention (i.e.concurrent membrane sweeping with dinoprostone or only dinoprostone) until the time of vaginal delivery, assessed up to 24 hours
primary_outcome.description: Vaginal delivery within 24 hours is defined as vaginal delivery after 24 hours of initiating intervention (i.e.concurrent membrane sweeping with dinoprostone or only dinoprostone) on the first day of induction.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of initiating intervention (i.e.concurrent membrane sweeping with dinoprostone or only dinoprostone) until the time of active phase of labor ( defined as a cervical dilatation of >=4cm), assessed up to 24 hours
secondary_outcome.description: to achieve the active phase of labor corresponding to a cervical dilatation of >=4cm

secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of labor induction (assessed up to 120 hours)
secondary_outcome.description: From the time of initiating intervention (i.e.concurrent membrane sweeping with dinoprostone or only dinoprostone) until the time of cesarean delivery, assessed up to 120 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: The interval from start of oxytocin to delivery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of initiating oxytocin infusion until the time of delivery, assessed up to 120 hours

arm_group.description: Women assigned to "Concurrent oxytocin with membrane sweeping" had their cervix swept by inserting the examining finger as high as possible past the internal cervical os, followed by oxytocin infusion the next day

For women assigned to "Concurrent oxytocin with dinoprostone vaginal insert": The 10mg dinoprostone vaginal insert were placed in the posterior fornix for cervical ripening, followed by oxytocin infusion the next day

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- singleton pregnancy
- Nulliparous women
- gestational age >=37.0 weeks
- Bishop score <=6
- intact amniotic membrane
- absence of labor
- live fetus with vertex presentation
- no previous uterine surgical procedure
Exclusion Criteria:
- Multiple pregnancy
- Placenta previa

facility.name: Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology Seoul National University Bundang Hospital
